inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getPolicies.

filter.description: The type of policies to be returned in the response. Valid values are `SERVICE_CONTROL_POLICY | TAG_POLICY | BACKUP_POLICY | AISERVICES_OPT_OUT_POLICY`

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getPolicies.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

ids.description: List of all the policy ids found.
